caption: Certificate
description: Public and private (SSL/TLS) certificates for use with AWS services and internal connected resources.
name: certificate

algorithm.description: The algorithm of the certificate (e.g RSA-1024).

domain.description: The domain name of the certificate.

imported_time.description: The timestamp of when the certificate was imported.

in_use_by.description: List of resource ARNs where the certificate is in use.

renewable_eligibility.description: Whether the certificate is eligible for renewal (e.g. ELIGIBLE).

source.caption: Certificate Source
source.description: The source of the certificate. For certificates that AWS Certificate Manager provides, Type is AMAZON_ISSUED. For certificates that are imported with ImportCertificate, Type is IMPORTED.

state.description: The state of the certificate (e.g. ISSUED).

uid_alt.description: This is the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.
